usdl.servicemodel

Class PricePlan

  • java.lang.Object
    • usdl.servicemodel.PricePlan

  • public class PricePlan
extends java.lang.Object
    The PricePlan class represents an instance of a PricePlan resource of the LinkedUSDL Pricing model.
    Version:
    1.0, March 06
    Author:
    Daniel Barrigas, Jorge Araujo

      • addPriceComponent

        public void addPriceComponent(PriceComponent pc)

      • removePriceComponentAt

        public void removePriceComponentAt(int index)
        Removes a Price Component from the Price Plan.
        Parameters:
        index - Position of the Price Component that is to be eliminated.

      • calculatePrice

        public double calculatePrice(com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Model model)
        Calculates the price value of the Price Plan. The price value is the sum of each its Price Components.
        Returns:
        A PriceSpec instance that contains the price value of the Price Plan.
